attributes.action: STOP imigration into the UK. Use the savings from benefits paid to restructure our state pension scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Perhaps we may then be able to retire at a resonable age, instead of dying whilst still working to an ever increasing age  to subsidise the bennefits claimed by unskilled immigrants that are flooding into this land. Perhaps we can then consider taking proper care of this countries elderly, after all, they have already worked and contributed to the countries financies just to be treated as second class citizens and are now forced to stand last in line behind new immigrants as far as bennefits and health care are concerned.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
